settings.code:
<style>
body.template-collection {
background-color: #000;
}
body.template-collection .main-content *:not(.modal.micromodal-slide *, button.js-drawer-open-collection-filters, button.js-drawer-open-collection-filters svg path, select, .grid-product__price--original, select option), body.template-collection 
 #shopify-section-footer, #shopify-section-footer-promotions, body.template-collection .shopify-section.index-section *:not(button.js-drawer-open-collection-filters, button.js-drawer-open-collection-filters svg path, select, .grid-product__price--original) {
color: #fff !important;
}

body.template-collection .info-icon svg {
fill: #fff !important;}

body.template-collection .main-content select, body.template-collection .main-content input, button.js-drawer-open-collection-filters, button.js-drawer-open-collection-filters svg path {
color: #000 !important;
}

</style>
